TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewRowHeaderCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell

summary.span: 表示 控制項的資料列行首。

span.span: Represents a row header of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks App.config 檔案包含下列項目時，根據系統 DPI 設定會調整大小的資料列狀態映像 （鉛筆、 星號和箭號）：The row status images (pencil, asterisk, and arrow) are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```

span.para: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有明確呼叫 方法，將會在參考 屬性時呼叫該方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 取得或設定，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`安裝.NET framework 組件。To get or set , you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值而定的屬性控制項，這個方法會呼叫控制項的方法來擷取剪貼簿格式的值，表示儲存格。Depending on the value of the property of the control, this method is called by the control's method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell. 位置相關的參數，這個方法可讓您指出此資料格代表在所選儲存格所定義之區域的資料的資料表中的所在位置控制項。The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the control. 根據儲存格的位置，格式設定資訊可能會傳回由這個方法除了儲存格的值。Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value. 比方說，資料列的第一個資料行中的資料格的 HTML 格式將會包含表示資料列開頭的標記。For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row. 支援的剪貼簿格式包括， ， ，和。The supported clipboard formats include , , , and . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class.

exception.span: 小於零或是大於或等於控制項中的資料列數。

span.span: is less than zero or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the control.
